sentences.english: In some cases, the relationship might go downhill after having spent a couple of blissful years together.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，融洽生活多年的夫婦也會勞燕分飛。

sentences.english: Ernest Hemingway and Hadley separated. She kept their son.
sentences.chinese: 海明威和哈德麗勞燕分飛，兒子由哈德麗撫養。

sentences.english: But on Friday, the pair announced they were no longer together.
sentences.chinese: 不過在週五，這對夫妻宣佈他們勞燕分飛了。
